replies.body:
Hello Summoner!

I'm sorry to hear that you are experiencing logging on!  While errors in the Log-in screen may be indicative of a connection issue, this is not always the case.  I strongly recommend that you try completing the following steps, which should hopefully allow you to log-in normally:

1)  Sync your Windows Clock - https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20201443-syncing-windows-clock

2) Confirm that your Internet Explorer options are set up correctly - https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/21931765-Windows-Settings-Troubleshooting

3) Make sure that following certificates in IE are turned off.  You can find the certificate option here - IE Options > Advanced > Restore Advanced Settings, IE Options > Advanced 

*  "Check for server certificate authentication"
* "Check for server certificate revocation"
* "Check for publisher's certificate revocation"
* "Warn about certificate address mismatch"

I hope this helps!  If you are still experiencing issues logging in, make sure that you submit a new ticket to Player Support, which you can find here:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/tickets/new
